features.name: Agile
features.description: Your movement stays silent. Spend a Hope to move up to Far range without rolling.

features.name: Fragile
features.description: When you take Major or worse damage, you drop out of Beastform.

features.name: Hobbling Strike
features.description: When you hit a target in melee, you can mark a Stress to make them temporarily Vulnerable.

features.name: Pack Hunting
features.description: When you hit a target an ally struck immediately before you, add a d8 to your damage roll.

features.name: Armored Shell
features.description: You resist physical damage. Mark an Armor slot to withdraw into your shell; while shelled, physical damage is reduced by your Armor Score after resistance, and you cannot act until you emerge.

features.name: Cannonball
features.description: Mark a Stress to let an ally launch you. They make an Agility or Strength attack against a target within Close range; on a hit, the target takes d12+2 physical damage using the thrower's Proficiency. Spend a Hope to also hit a second target within very close of the first for half damage.

features.name: Carrier
features.description: You can carry up to two willing allies when you move.

features.name: Vicious Maul
features.description: When you hit, spend a Hope to make the target temporarily Vulnerable and gain +1 Proficiency on that attack.

features.name: Carrier
features.description: You can carry up to four willing allies when you move.

features.name: Demolish
features.description: Spend a Hope to move up to Far range in a straight line and attack all targets in melee along the path. On a hit, deal d8+10 physical damage using your Proficiency and make targets temporarily Vulnerable.

features.name: Undaunted
features.description: Gain +2 to all your damage thresholds.
